MESSAGE.ACCESS_DENIED:
Your don't have permission to access data.
Contact Administrator to get access to this data.
MESSAGE.ACCOUNT_EMAIL_EXISTED: This account already exists on system.
MESSAGE.AUTOMATION_ACTIONS_INVALID: Your automation actions is not valid
MESSAGE.AUTOMATION_CONDITIONS_INVALID: Your automation conditions is not valid
MESSAGE.BAD_REQUEST: Our system could not understand your request. Please modify and try again.
MESSAGE.CONTACT_WORKSPACE_OWNER_ADMIN: Contact workspace owner and workspace admin to upgrade your plan
MESSAGE.BILLING_3P_ERROR: Due to some technical error, you cannot perform this action.
MESSAGE.BILLING_3P_INVOICE_ERROR: Due to some technical error, you cannot download invoice now.
MESSAGE.BILLING_MIN_PAY_LIMIT: The transaction amount must not be less than 10,000 VND.
MESSAGE.BILLING_UPGRADE_STACK: Due to some payment rules, you can not pay for plan with this period.
MESSAGE.CURRENT_PASSWORD_INCORRECT: Your current password is missing or incorrect.
MESSAGE.DATA_MANIPULATION_FAIL: Sorry, we're unable to manipulate your data.
MESSAGE.DOWNLOAD_FILE_FAIL: Sorry, we're unable to download your file.
MESSAGE.EMAILS_DUPLICATED: Some emails in list was duplicated.
MESSAGE.EMAIL_INCORRECT: Your email is missing or incorrect.
MESSAGE.EXPORT_DOCUMENT_FAIL: Sorry, we're unable to export your document.
MESSAGE.FIELD_FORMAT_CONDITION_INVALID: Your field format condition is not valid
MESSAGE.FORMAT_STYLE_CONDITIONS_INVALID: Your format style conditions is not valid
MESSAGE.ITEM_NOT_AVAILABLE_ON_VIEW: Item was not available on current view.
MESSAGE.LIMIT_ACTION_ITEM_COUNT: Maximum action item limit has been reached.
MESSAGE.LIMIT_IMPORT_ITEM_COUNT: Maximum import item limit has been reached.
MESSAGE.LIMIT_UPLOAD_FILE_COUNT: Maximum upload file limit has been reached.
MESSAGE.LIMIT_UPLOAD_FILE_SIZE: Invalid file. The file size is too big.
MESSAGE.MISSING_REQUIRED_FIELD: Item cannot be created since you do not have the permission to edit some required fields. Please ask board admin to grant you the edit permission.
MESSAGE.REACH_LIMITATION_MEMBERS: The number of active users reached limitation. Please upgrade your plan.
MESSAGE.SOMETHING_MISSING:
We are sorry for this inconvenience.
Please try the action again and if the problem continues, contact Custom Support.
MESSAGE.SOMETHING_WENT_WRONG:
Brace yourself till we get the error fixed.
You may also refresh the page or try again later.
MESSAGE.TOKEN_INVALID: Your token is not valid or has expired.
MESSAGE.UNDER_MAINTENANCE:
We're busy preparing Cubable to serve you better.
Please check back soon.
MESSAGE.UPLOAD_FILE_FAIL: Sorry, we're unable to upload your file.
MESSAGE.USER_LOGIN_FAIL: Your email or password is missing or incorrect.
MESSAGE.YOUR_WORKSPACE_HAVE_REACHED_THE_LIMIT: Your workspace have reached the limit of your current plan. Upgrade your plan to give workspace the power it needs.
